lines.text: [first lines]
Okay, Pluto, let's get our tree.
Get a load of that. Can you top that?
That kills me!
[Mickey starts chopping the tree down]
What was that?
I don't know.
[the tree falls to the ground]
Oh, boy! Okay, Pluto! Alright? Come on, let's go.

[Mickey has placed the tree in his house]
Hey, wake up.

[admires the decorations]
Well what do you know? Wow!

[Pluto sees the chipmunks and tries to attack them, as they run up to the fireplace mantle, where there are Santa candles]
Pluto, that's it. Cut it out.
[Pluto barks at Chip, who is wearing a candletop Santa hat]
There, is that better? Oh, Pluto. Okay, I'll light the candles.
[lights all of the candles, including Chip]
There!

[Mickey and Pluto leave, and Dale puts out Chip's flame]
Thank you.
Let's go.

[Pluto is attacking the Christmas tree, to get Chip and Dale]
Pluto, get out of there! What do you think you're... Cut it out! Watch out!
[the tree's leaves and ornaments fall down]
You dumb mutt! Now look what you've done to our...
[sees the Chip and Dale]
Pluto, we've got chipmunks in our tree! Cute little fellas.
[hold them in his hands, Pluto barks at them]
Pluto! After all, it is Christmas.
[last lines]

[singing]
Deck the halls with boughs of holly / Fa la la la la la la la la. / 'Tis the season to be jolly / Fa la la la la la la la la.

[singing]
Don we now our gay apparel / Fa la la la la la la la la. / Troll the ancient Yuletide carol / Fa la la la la la la la la.
